column2: [ ' i just qualified for the nabard internship ' , ' <allcaps> woot </allcaps> ! thats great news . congratulations ! ' , ' i started crying ' ]
[ ' how dare you slap my child ' , ' if you spoil my car , i will do that to you too ' , ' just try to do that once ' ]
[ ' i was hurt by u more ' , ' you didnt mean it . ' , ' say u love me ' ]
